author: James Martin
method: Mix the crushed digestives with the honey in a bowl. Spoon the mixture into a chefs' ring on a serving plate and press down. Meanwhile, mix the mascarpone, ginger and sugar together in a bowl to combine. Spoon the mixture into the ring and smooth off the top using a palette knife.  Carefully heat the ring using a blowtorch and remove the ring. Serve.
ingredients: 85g/3oz digestive biscuits, crushed,  2-3 tbsp honey,  200g/7oz mascarpone,  1-2 tsp stem ginger, chopped,  2 tbsp icing sugar
